short_description: bean and boy is a cleaning equipment supplier based in westcliff-on-sea, united kingdom.
long_description: bean & boy is a family-run business making beautiful soap bars by hand in southend-on-sea using ethically-sourced vegan ingredients. each bar is a work of art, made from the finest natural ingredients that are straight from the earth. we keep classes small and focus on quality, and you can learn anything from traditional handmade soap to handpoured soy candles and even bath bombs. right now we're loving. we have spent a lot of time, effort, money and experience researching and developing the best bar soap formulations so that you can enjoy using our soaps and know that your skin is going to love you for it. there's also a range of household soaps, hand soaps and more. we've got bars of soap for your bath, your body, your hands, your hair, your home, your washing, your pets, and your life. bean & boy soaps are designed for skin and loved by families, but are also good for the planet which mzakes them ideal for anyone who loves a bit of bath-time luxury that's great for the skin.

generated_description: bean and boy, legally known as bean and boy ltd., is a family-run business based in westcliff-on-sea, england. the company specializes in handmade soap bars made from ethically-sourced, organically-grown, and vegan ingredients. each bar is crafted by hand, allowed to cure for six weeks, and then wrapped in brown paper to order. also offers soapmaking workshops, teaching traditional cold process soapmaking, essential oil candles, natural bath bombs, and balms and salves. the company is known for its high-quality products and commitment to using natural ingredients.
